name: Cone Wars
description:
Made as part of IGI Pub Jam 2017 (https://itch.io/jam/igi-2).

2 Gamepads required

Controls

  • Right trigger thrust
  • Left trigger backwards thrust
  • A attach to ball (or player in vicinity)
  • Left thumbstick rotate
  • Keyboard r to reset

Made in Unreal Engine

by Ævar Örn Kvaran
